Melee Weapon Attack: +9 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 24 (4d8 + 6) piercing damage.
Melee Weapon Attack:
 +9 to hit, reach 5 ft., one prone creature. 
Hit:
 22 (3d10 + 6) bludgeoning damage.

If the triceratops moves at least 20 feet straight toward a creature and then hits it with a gore attack on the
same turn, that target must succeed on a DC 13 Strength saving throw or be knocked prone. If the target is prone, the triceratops can make one stomp
attack against it as a bonus action.
